parameters.name: Num1
parameters.description: Number of instances in the first direction, including the original

parameters.name: Spacing1
parameters.description: Spacing in radians

parameters.name: Num2
parameters.description: Number of instances in the second direction

parameters.name: Spacing2
parameters.description: Spacing in radians

parameters.name: FlipDir1
parameters.description: True flips the direction of the first direction, false does not

parameters.name: FlipDir2
parameters.description: True flips the direction of the second direction, false does not

parameters.name: EqualSpacing1
parameters.description: True uses equal spacing between instances in the first direction, false does not

parameters.name: EqualSpacing2
parameters.description: True uses equal spacing between instances in the second direction, false does not

parameters.name: UseCentroid
parameters.description: True uses the centroid as reference point, false does not

parameters.name: AlignToSeed
parameters.description: True aligns the new objects with the seed feature, false does not

parameters.name: OffsetCurve
parameters.description: True offsets the curve, false transforms it

parameters.name: PatternSeedOnly
parameters.description: True uses only the seed feature in the second direction, false does not
